about_the_game:
Gus was a once stray cat who lost communication with his family. He strives to be a Kitten Intergalactic TaskForce agent, or KIT for short. His ultimate goal is to once day find his lost family. As a KIT agent, Gus must go on secret missions as well as managing the KIT station itself. While at the KIT station, Gus meets Stella, his soon to be partner in CLAW!



Stella is a long time trainee of the Kitten Intergalactic Taskforce. She is a high ranking Agent. At first things were rough between Stella and Gus, but she grew to enjoy Gus. She has been an agent for as long as she could remember. She isn't the easiest to get along with, unless she gets her way that is.



10% of the profits for Gus & Stella's Stellar Adventure will be donated to Angels With Paws cat rescue. Gripping Tales, LLC started the Adopt Me Program in hopes of getting more cats adopted and improving the overall quality of the shelter. So far, Gripping Tales has set up fundraisers which has garnered attention from the local news. Gripping Tales has more plans to improve the shelter including the implementation of solar panels to ensure these great cats have a home.
Follow the progress:

As a KIT agent, Gus must go on secret missions as well as managing the KIT station itself. While at the KIT station, Gus meets Stella, his soon to be partner in CLAW!



Stella is a long time trainee of the Kitten Intergalactic Taskforce. She is a high ranking Agent. At first things were rough between Stella and Gus, but she grew to enjoy Gus. She has been an agent for as long as she could remember. She isn't the easiest to get along with, unless she gets her way that is.



10% of the profits for Gus & Stella's Stellar Adventure will be donated to Angels With Paws cat rescue. name: Gus & Stella's Stellar Adventure

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti or Radeon HD 7770
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 720p resolutions
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or Radeon R9 270
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS at 1080p resolution

reviews:
“Well cats are just cute, and these cats are too cute”
10/10 – The People
short_description: Help Gus find out where his family is, and who was behind the attack that left his ear bitten off. Craft, Climb, Solve Puzzles, Win Battles, and Get to know the Cats at the Kitten Intergalactic Taskforce station!
